roleset.name: Slang for scapegoat

roles.note: See scapegoat.01 for examples of arg2.

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: We are not looking for hides to skin nor goats whnp-none-1 PRO to scape *T*-1.

roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in wsj-nw. Framed by Claire, comparison to scapegoat.01.
